name: BlazBlue: Cross Tag Battle - Deluxe Edition
summary: Engage in fast-paced 2v2 team battles filled with the craziness you’ve come to love from BlazBlue, with all the tight mechanics, smooth gameplay, and gorgeous 2D graphics you expect from Arc System Works. Choose from an eclectic cast of over 20 fighters. Jin Kisaragi, Rachel Alucard, Yosuke Hanamura and more are ready to join the fray!
